name: Kick Scooter for Kids Ages 8+ Teens & Adults, with Front handbrake and Rear Brake, and Adjustable Handlebars, Big Sturdy PU Flash Wheels Great Gift & Toy
short_description: Family-Friendly Design for All Ages： Built to support up to 220 lbs with heavy-duty construction, this kick scooter features a 3-height adjustable handlebar (35.5"/37.8"/40") to accommodate both kids and adults. Perfect for parent-child bonding or growing riders, it grows with your child for years of shared adventures.

Safety-Enhanced Glowing LED Wheels： Equipped with eye-catching 8" LED wheels that light up while rolling, combining cool aesthetics with increased visibility. Ideal for dusk, cloudy days, or low-light conditions to boost safety.Bearing: ABEC-9 oversized wheels ensure smooth gliding with minimal effort.

Dual Braking System + Shock Absorption： Features both a rear foot brake and bicycle-style hand brakes for reliable stopping power. The shock-absorbing suspension system tackles rough terrain effortlessly—from gravel paths to uneven sidewalks—keeping rides stable and comfortable.

Space-Saving Foldable Design： Quick-fold handles and body collapse into a compact size for easy storage. Lightweight (9.6lbs) and portable, it’s perfect for car trunks, public transit, or tight spaces. Simple folding mechanism requires no tools—just press the lever and go.

Beyond Play: Practical Daily Companion： More than a toy—use it for quick errands to cafes, parks, or transit hubs. Promotes balance skills and active play while tackling exercise goals. Includes a built-in kickstand for hassle-free parking anywhere.

name: Micro Kickboard - Maxi Deluxe Pro LED Kick Scooter - Smooth-Gliding, 3-Wheeled, Light-Up Wheels, Lean-to-Steer Design with Fat, Stable Wheels and Chopper-Style Handlebars for Ages 5-12
short_description: Built with wider LED wheels and a wide-grip, chopper-style handlebar for the smoothest ride!

Your kiddo can ride and glide ANYWHERE with kickboard-style turning that is more stable, and more fun. The Maxi's 3-wheel kickboard-style ride feels a little like being on a skateboard, but with more control!
Grows with your child from age 5 to 12, (up to 110 lbs) thanks to an adjustable T-bar so no need to purchase a new scooter year after year.
All parts are replaceable so you never throw it away - plan to pass it on to a sibling, cousin, or friend when your kiddo is done! Backed by our 2-year warranty.
product_description: The Maxi Deluxe Pro LED offers wide front LED wheels, a cool chopper-style handlebar, and trendy color combinations. Besides its unique new look, this classic kickboard scores high with quality and practical features. Designed with 'lean-to-steer' or weight-shifting steering, this Micro scooter gives children ages 5-12 a distinctive rider experience, helping promote balance and coordination. Additional features of this sleek new ride include an anodized stem for extra protection against wear and tear, a unique, silicone-injected footplate for improved grip, and an adjustable T-bar, meaning that as your child grows, their Maxi Deluxe will grow with them. Plus, easy-to-use LED wheels, as they are motion-activated and do not require batteries! Impeccable Swiss engineering, thoughtful attention to detail and innovative design makes this a Micro scooter to bring on every adventure! *All images are for reference only and are not to scale. Safety certified by the CPSC, the Maxi Deluxe Pro is recommended for children up to 110 lbs.

name: Micro Scooters | Cruiser LED Children's Scooter | Handlebar Adjustable | Lightweight | Light Up Wheels | Foldable | 6-12yrs | Boys & Girls
short_description: This upgraded Cruiser features a neochrome finish and motion-activated light-up LED wheels on the front and back, adding some blaze to the ride.

The Cruiser is easy to fold and carry with Micro's convenient folding mechanism, making it convenient to pack for a trip and it take up less room when storing the scooter. It also offers easy upright 'parking' with our 2-way kickstand.
The cool chopper-style handlebar plus low deck offers premium comfort and control in a unique ‘low-ride’ style. The handlebars adjust from 27" to 32" high as your child grows.

Every part on the Cruiser is replaceable! Once your child has outgrown it, freshen it up to pass to a sibling or a pal, so your Cruiser never ends up in a landfill. 2-year manufacturer warranty + rockin’ customer service included.
Due to the nature of the material, neochrome finishes are prone to variation: each one looks a little bit different!
product_description: The first Micro scooter was invented in Switzerland when a group of friends wanted a quicker way to get from A to B without relying on bulky bikes or having to haul their car out of the garage. Since then, they have sold millions of their streamlined folding scooters around the world. After spotting the Swiss scooter in a Clapham playground, two mums, Anna and Philippa, teamed up to distribute Micro scooters in the UK and share their passion for Micro’s bright idea with the nation. Micro was created to make everyday journeys better. Better for today’s families. Better for our world. Over 20 years later “make it better” is a shared goal that continues to drive all we do. We're on a journey. We have a long way to go. But we're committed to doing our bit every day to have a positive impact-for people and planet. We think scooting is about more than just getting from A to B. We think scooting has the power to help people feel better, move better and tread more gently on our planet. So we're committed to constantly finding ways to help spread Micro feel-good to as many people as we can-and to help them stay safe while they scoot. Team Micro may be small, but our shared goal means we pack a mighty punch. Driven by our customers, focused on making everyday journeys better-together we make good things happen.

short_description: EYE-CATCHING FLASH WHEELS: Equipped with 3 LED Lighted Wheels, the Gotrax KS3 kick scooter creates a stunning visual effect during riding, making your child the center of attention. Safety is paramount, as the wheels illuminate even in the dark, providing peace of mind for parents.

THE IDEAL FIRST KIDS SCOOTER: Featuring Lean-to-Steer technology, the KS3 kids scooter enables kids to turn by leaning, fostering balance and coordination. The seat is foldable and can be easily removed, allowing kids to switch between sitting and standing modes as they ride, providing a versatile riding experience. Adjustable height (31.3 to 34.8 inches) makes it perfect for growing children.

EASY ASSEMBLY & CARRY: Simply press the red button and insert the stem into the base to complete the installation, just press the red button and pull out the stem to complete the disassembly. This kid's scooter weighs just 7.3lb, making it light enough to carry and fit in your car trunk or store with ease.

SAFE & SMOOTH RIDE EXPERIENCE: Gotrax KS3 kick scooter is equipped with ABEC-7 Bearings wheels, the scooter offers extra stability and smooth rides even on uneven and bumpy surfaces. The wide anti-slip deck (5 inches) and rear mudguard brake ensure your child's safety while riding.

EXCELLENT SERVICE: Gotrax offers a 1-year manufacturer's assurance, providing assurance that your Gotrax KS3 kid's scooter is built to last. Any questions, please contact us at any time and we're happy to help!

name: Jetson Character Kids Kick Scooter, LED Lights on Stem & Light-Up Wheels, Lightweight Frame, Height-Adjustable Handlebar, Lean-to-Steer System, Easy-Fold Mechanism
short_description: Lean to Steer System: Riding just got easier, simply lean to where you want to go on the handlebars
Easy Folding: Collapse and carry, or fold and stow, wherever you’re going, it’s easy
Always Growing: You can easily adjust the handlebar height to modify this scooter as your child grows
Light up Scooter: Motion activated LED lights on the wheels so you sparkle as you ride and LED lights with 7 programmed light functions in the stem

product_description: Highlights For ultimate Sonic fans: Complete with sound effects, a ride on this scooter is a ring-collecting journey. Sturdy 3-wheel base and lean-to-steer system. Light-up, lightweight frame that kids can fold and carry on their own. Product Details For little riders who love the blue hedgehog, this is the ultimate way to get around. A scooter ride is not just a scooter ride on this Sonic-themed spinner: With the push of a button, kids can adventure down the sidewalk with the game’s soundtrack streaming from the built in speaker. Another push of the button, and they’ll hear the classic plinks of ring-collection -- and be rewarded with a power-up sound after they accumulate 10. Meanwhile, there’s lights galore—up and down the stem, in a headlight, and with motion-activated light-up wheels. Riders have their own fan club right below their feet: Sonic and other characters from the game are featured on the deck to encourage supersonic travel. Early adventuring The lean-to-steer system and rear foot brake are easy for young riders to master. Level up Sonic powers-up -- but young kids grow up. The height-adjustable handlebar has their growth spurts covered. Take the lead At just 7 pounds, this scooter is light enough for kids to carry. Folding it for carrying and storage is a cinch, too.
